attributes.action: that petitioners should be able to comment on this site to governments answers to each petition.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
It`s about time that the petitioners of this site be allowed to respond to the answers the politicians and there lackys that put on this site.

To date ALL answers to ALL petitions have been one sided. WE the population put forward a petition and the answer we all get is . Take it or leave it .
This is not how Democracy works .
For each petition accepted we should be able to comment on the answer. Now that IS Democracy. No Politician of the Labour party or any party in power wants this petition that`s why it will be rejected.
So sign up and show them what democracy really means.

rejection.details: This will be treated as feedback and given strong consideration for the future development of this site.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
